statements: SELECT * FROM video_consultations WHERE consultation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_date, consultation_time FROM video_consultations ORDER BY consultation_date ASC, consultation_time DESC;
SELECT patient_id, physician_id FROM video_consultations WHERE consultation_duration > 30;
SELECT consultation_id, video_call_link FROM video_consultations WHERE physician_id = 'cba98765-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM video_consultations WHERE consultation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM video_consultations WHERE consultation_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, physician_id, consultation_date FROM video_consultations WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND physician_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_duration, video_call_link FROM video_consultations WHERE consultation_duration > 30 ORDER BY consultation_date DESC, consultation_time DESC;
SELECT patient_id, physician_id, consultation_date, consultation_time FROM video_consultations WHERE consultation_date = '2022-06-30' AND consultation_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_consultations, AVG(consultation_duration) AS avg_duration FROM video_consultations WHERE physician_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_phone FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 5;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_duration > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments, patient_name FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE appointments.appointment_duration > 60 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Doctors;
SELECT name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT id, name, email FROM Patients WHERE id = 101;
SELECT doctor_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE is_virtual = true;
SELECT doctor_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE specialty='Cardiology' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM Patients WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT doctor_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE is_virtual = true ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.id = Appointments.doctor_id WHERE Doctors.specialty='Pediatrics' AND Appointments.is_virtual = true;
SELECT Patients.id, Patients.name, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Appointments ON Patients.id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE Patients.id = 2;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT consultation_notes, consultation_result FROM consultations WHERE consultation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_email FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;

SELECT appointments.appointment_id, patients.patient_name, doctors.doctor_name FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date ASC, appointments.appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_email, patient_phone FROM patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, license_number FROM doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, license_number FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, consultation_type FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM consultations WHERE consultation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_name, illness, diagnosis FROM medical_history WHERE illness LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY diagnosis ASC;
